attributes.additional_details:
The journalist has attempted to stir up Anti-Islamic feeling resulting in death threats against Streatham mosque and potential attacks against Muslims in Britain.

Miss Newman Lied  about been 'ushered' off the premises last week when CCTV showed her being helped by 3 people.

CCTV footage shows the 40-year-old leaving the building unaccompanied the mosque apologised when it had need to do so out of fear of attacks.

Mosque trustees said they felt 'vindicated' but want 'unreserved apology'  Provided a vague half hearted apology and there still has been no apology from Channel 4 or the Channel 4 News Team and no indication of Disciplinary against Cathy Newman.

If the same incident had occurred against a Synagogue or Church would she still have a job?
